name: 郭政淳
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
schedule:
Wk 1	Introduction/Coordinating Conjunctions
Wk 2	Holiday-No Class
Wk 3	Adverb Clauses
Wk 4	Connectives 
Wk 5	Conditional Sentences
Wk 6	Midterm Review List
Wk 7	Holiday-No Class
Wk 8	Midterm 
Wk 9	Units of Clauses and Sentences
Wk 10	Sentence Fragments and Run-On Sentences
Wk 11	Dangling Modifiers and Misplaced Modifiers
Wk 12	Parallelism/Writing Workshop (I)
Wk 13	Peer Review (I)/Illogical Comparisons and Mixed Constructions
Wk 14	Punctuation
Wk 15	Mechanics: Capital Letters, Italics, the Apostrophe, the Hyphen, Numbers
Wk 16	Use of the Dictionary/Writing Workshop (II)
Wk 17	Peer Review (II)/Recapitulation
Wk 18	Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance		15%
Quizzes			15%
Workshops & 
    Peer Review	30%
Midterm Exam 	20%
Final Exam 		20%
materials: Azar, B. S. & Hagen, S. A. (2009). Understanding and Using English Grammar (4th ed.). New York: Pearson Education.
